title: Alert Management

form.name: Alert Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: When Savings Plans utilization is below 95%, send email to ops@example.com and admin@example.com
form.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least {{min}} characters
form.accountRequired: Please select an account to monitor

message.testEmailSent: Test email sent, please check your inbox
message.triggerSuccess: System scan triggered, please check logs later

confirm.deleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete alert "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

noAccountWarning: This alert has no account configured. Please edit the alert and set an account first.

tips.nameHint: üí° Give your alert a short, descriptive name
tips.accountHint: üí° Select the cloud account to monitor. The Agent will use this account's credentials to query data.
tips.descriptionHint: üí° Describe the alert condition and recipients in natural language. AI will understand automatically.

systemInfo.checkFrequency: Check Frequency: Runs automatically once daily
systemInfo.notificationMethod: Notification: Email sent only when conditions are triggered
systemInfo.aiParsing: AI Parsing: System automatically extracts recipient emails from description

examples.title: Here are some example alert descriptions for your reference:
examples.ec2Cost: When daily EC2 cost exceeds $1000, send email to finance@example.com
examples.riCoverage: When RI coverage is below 80%, notify ops@example.com and admin@example.com
examples.unusedEbs: Check for unused EBS volumes, alert devops@example.com if more than 10 found
examples.s3Growth: Check S3 storage cost daily, send email to cost-team@example.com if growth exceeds 20%

tooltip.checkNow: Trigger a system-wide alert check immediately (Admin only)
